ebtjx.question: What microphone options are available to the flight crew?

options.text: Headset boom microphone, oxygen mask microphone, ceiling speakers microphone.
Headset boom microphone and hand microphone.
Hand microphone, headset boom microphone, oxygen mask microphone, overhead speaker microphone.
Hand microphone, headset boom microphone, oxygen mask microphone.

eelhbk.question: When the ALT-NORM switch on the Audio Control Panel (ACP) is selected to ALT, what is the result?

options.text: ACP operates in a degraded mode, VHF-1 for Captain, HF-1 for Observer and VHF-2 for First Officer.
ACP operates in a degraded mode, VHF-1 for Captain and Observer, VHF-2 for First Officer.
All communications are routed through the ACP on the AFT Overhead Panel.
ACP operates in a degraded mode, VHF-2 for Captain, HF-2 for Observer, and VHF-1 for First Officer.

68ouh.question: Selecting the Cockpit Voice Recorder to ON has what effect?

options.text: Powers the cockpit voice recorder until 5 after the last engine shutdown.
Powers the cockpit voice recorder until the switch is moved to OFF
Powers the cockpit voice recorder until first engine is started, then trips to AUTO.
Powers the cockpit voice recorder after the first engine is started until 5 minutes after last engine shutdown.

zpq62.question: VHF antennae located on the upper fuselage are susceptible to multipath interference from other air traffic, antennae located on the lower fuselage are not as susceptible to this interference.

oo4mg.question: Communication between the flight deck and flight attendants is still possible with the SERVICE INTERPHONE switch selected OFF.

npsipg.question: What is the effect of pushing the Pilot Call switch?

options.text: Two-tone chime in flight deck.
Two-tone chime in passenger cabin, with both pink master call lights illuminated.
Single-tone chime in passenger cabin with both pink call lights illuminated.
Single-tone chime in flight deck.

5u0ms.question: The volume of received communications can be controlled by rotating the selected RECEIVER SWITCHES on the Radio Tuning Panel.

03loi.question: The Flight Interphone and Service Interphone are on separate networks.

bffmi.question: What are the 3 positions For the Audio Control Panel Filter switch?

options.text: V, B, R,   Voice, Both, Range.
Pushed to select filtering ON, Pushed again for filtering OFF, rotated to increase or decrease amount of filtering.
V, B, R,    Voice, Both, Radio.
R, G, B,   Radio, Ground, Both.
